TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OleDbFactory extends System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory
Public NotInheritable Class OleDbFactory Inherits DbProviderFactory
public ref class OleDbFactory sealed : System::Data::Common::DbProviderFactory

Docs.summary: Representa um conjunto de métodos para criar instâncias de implementação do provedor OLEDB das classes de fonte de dados.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.Common.DbCommand CreateCommand() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateCommand () As DbCommand

Docs.summary: Retorna uma instância de fortemente tipada.
Docs.returns: Uma nova instância fortemente tipada de .

remarks.format:
## Examples O fragmento de código a seguir retorna um tipo mais acentuado <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> instância:
```vb Dim newFactory As OleDbFactory = OleDbFactory.Instance Dim cmd As DbCommand = newFactory.CreateCommand() ```
```csharp OleDbFactory newFactory = OleDbFactory.Instance; DbCommand cmd = newFactory.CreateCommand(); ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Data.OleDb.OleDbFactory Instance
Public Shared ReadOnly Instance As OleDbFactory

Docs.summary: Obtém uma instância do . Isso pode ser usado para recuperar objetos de dados fortemente tipados.

remarks.format:
## Examples O fragmento de código a seguir usa o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbFactory.Instance> campo a recuperar uma <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbFactory> da instância e, em seguida, retornar um tipo mais acentuado <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> instância:
```vb Dim newFactory As OleDbFactory = OleDbFactory.Instance Dim cmd As DbCommand = newFactory.CreateCommand() ```
```csharp OleDbFactory newFactory = OleDbFactory.Instance; DbCommand cmd = newFactory.CreateCommand(); ```
